item.title: Fox Entertainment Studios Rounds Out Exec Team With Dana Tafoya-Cameron, Michelle Huynh
item.description: Bento Box’s Tafoya-Cameron will lead animation, and Huynh will oversee content operations.

item.title: Fox Entertainment Studios Rounds Out Exec Team With Dana Tafoya-Cameron, Michelle Huynh
item.description: Bento Box’s Tafoya-Cameron will lead animation, and Huynh will oversee content operations.

item.title: Bill Burr Signs First-Look TV Deal With Fox
item.description: The actor-comedian and his North Hill Productions banner will develop original scripted and unscripted comedies for the broadcaster’s studio arm.
